body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Shelby County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Paulina Thomas. Father of Benjamin W. Thomas, Oswald Thomas, Julia Thomas, Joseph Thomas, Curtis Thomas, and Newton B. Thomas. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860. Donor to the American Colonization Society in 1846 and 1849. Appointed a director of the Eminence and Shelbyville Turnpike Road Company in 1860.
